types.html:
de bouche (invariable)

  1. (relational) catering; food
    métier de bouche ― catering profession, catering trade
    le commerce de bouche ― food business, food trade
    des commerces de bouche ― food locations, food spots
    dépenses de bouche, frais de bouche ― food expenses
  2. suitable for direct consumption, without conditioning or preparation
    des fruits de bouche ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
    des agrumes de bouche ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)

See also

[edit]
  • de table
trans: suitable for direct consumption, without conditioning or preparation

title: de bouche
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /də buʃ/
